borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style="">The bulk, mass, scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in a harmful loss of outlook and privacy and cause an increased overbearing impact&nbsp;for neighbouring dwellings, especially no.49 Langley Crescent,&nbsp; therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to: </p><ul><li style="">Paragraph 135 of the National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (December 2023) </li><li style="">Policy D6&nbsp;of the London Plan (March 2021); </li><li style="">Policy CP3 of Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010) </li><li style="">Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011) </li><li style="">The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012); </li><li style="">Policies SP2, DMD1 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul>

<p style="">The bulk, mass, scale, siting and design of the proposed first floor side extension would present an undesirable addition to the dwelling, which would close off the openness of the corner plot and unbalance the symmetry and uniformity of the terrace row thus impacting the character of the area, notably given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate. As such, the proposed development is contrary to: </p><ul><li style="">Paragraphs 131, 135, 203, and 209 of the National Planning Policy Framework &nbsp;(NPPF) (December 2023) </li><li style="">Policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (March 2021)</li><li style="">Policies CP2 and CP3 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Core Strategy (July 2010) </li><li style="">Policies BP2, BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development Framework (LDF) Borough Wide Development Plan Document (DPD) (March 2011) </li><li style="">The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012) </li><li style="">Policies SP2, DMD1, DMD4 and DMD6 of the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</li></ul>
description: Construction of a first floor side extension
